channel.title: Comments on: Norman asks, “How can I accept credit card payments using my smartphone?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Downloadable: Apps for Small Business - Deemable Tech | Deemable Tech
item.dc:creator: Downloadable: Apps for Small Business - Deemable Tech | Deemable Tech
item.description: […] You can get all of these for essentially free (for example, the Square reader is $9.99 at retail stores, but it comes with a $10 mail-in rebate). The card reader companies make their money off transaction fees, which vary by device. You can read more about credit cards readers in this article. […]

The card reader companies make their money off transaction fees, which vary by device. You can read more about credit cards readers in this article. […]
